item.title: HF 辛克莱季度利润超预期，宣布回购 10 亿美元股票
item.description: 炼油商 HF Sinclair 周三公布的第一季度利润超出华尔街预期，主要得益于俄罗斯炼油厂停产和美国大修导致燃料供应紧张。【原文：Refiner HF Sinclair beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by tight fuel supplies due to refinery shutdowns in Russia and heavy maintenance in the U.S.】

item.title: 投资者寻求美国加息路径的线索，期货走势低迷
item.description: 周三，美国股指期货表现低迷，此前的强劲涨势将基准股指 S&P 500 指数推升至逾三周高位，原因是投资者希望进一步明确美联储的降息计划。【原文：U.S. stock index futures were muted on Wednesday after a strong run of gains that pushed the benchmark S&P 500 to over three-week highs, as investors sought more clarity on the Federal Reserve's plans for interest rate cuts.】

item.title: 宝马首席执行官：欧盟对中国电动汽车征收关税可能适得其反，阻碍绿色交易
item.description: 宝马公司首席执行官周三警告欧盟不要对中国汽车制造商生产的电动汽车征收进口关税，称这可能会破坏欧盟的 "绿色交易 "工业计划，并损害进口中国制造汽车的德国汽车制造商的利益。【原文：BMW's CEO on Wednesday warned against imposing EU import duties on electric vehicles from Chinese automakers, saying it could upend the bloc's Green Deal industrial plan and harm German automakers which import cars made in China.】

item.title: 韩国欢迎美国决定扩大中国石墨在电动汽车中的使用范围
item.description: 美国决定将汽车制造商为含有中国石墨的汽车提供电动汽车税收抵免的资格延长至2026年，韩国周三对此表示欢迎。【原文：South Korea on Wednesday welcomed a U.S. decision to extend automakers' eligibility for electric vehicle tax credits for cars containing Chinese graphite through 2026.】

item.title: Archegos 的 Bill Hwang：他被指控什么罪名？他会被关多久？
item.description: 前 Archegos 资本管理公司负责人黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）及其副手帕特里克-哈里根（Patrick Halligan）在 2021 年数天内倒闭，给全球银行造成数十亿美元的损失。【原文：The trial of former Archegos Capital Management head Sung Kook “Bill” Hwang and his deputy Patrick Halligan opens on Wednesday over their role in the failure of the investment firm, which collapsed in a span of days in 2021, causing billions of dollars in losses at global banks.】

item.title: Bill Hwang 因其价值 360 亿美元的 Archegos 基金崩溃而受审
item.description: 黄成国（Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang）因 Archegos 资本管理公司（Archegos Capital Management）倒闭而受到的敲诈勒索刑事审判将于本周三开庭，陪审员的挑选将决定黄成国和一名副手在 2021 年短短几天内瓦解的大规模股票交易计划中是否触犯了法律。【原文：Sung Kook "Bill" Hwang's criminal racketeering trial over the collapse of Archegos Capital Management begins on Wednesday with the selection of jurors who will decide if he and a deputy broke the law in a massive stock scheme that unraveled in just days in 2021.】

item.title: TC 能源公司的石油管道分拆项目在押注美国海湾地区时面临障碍
item.description: TC 能源公司计划分拆石油管道，赌它能向美国墨西哥湾炼油厂供应更多加拿大原油，但该企业面临激烈竞争，启动时将背负高额债务。【原文：TC Energy's planned oil pipeline spin-off is a bet that it can supply more Canadian crude to U.S. Gulf of Mexico refiners, but the venture faces stiff competition and will carry high debt when it starts up.】

item.title: 早间竞价：瑞典减产，石油价格下滑，股市活跃
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 独家报道美国着眼于遏制中国获取 ChatGPT 等应用程序背后的人工智能软件
item.description: 消息人士称，拜登政府准备开辟一条新战线，努力保护美国的人工智能免受中国的侵害，初步计划在最先进的人工智能模型（Models）（ChatGPT 等人工智能系统的核心软件）周围设置防护栏。【原文：The Biden administration is poised to open up a new front in its effort to safeguard U.S. AI from China with preliminary plans to place guardrails around the most advanced AI Models, the core software of artificial intelligence systems like ChatGPT, sources said.】

item.title: 大韩航空向美国航空航天公司 Sierra Nevada 出售五架喷气机
item.description: 大韩航空在周三提交的一份交易所文件中表示，将向美国航空航天公司内华达山脉公司（Sierra Nevada Corporation）出售五架飞机。【原文：Korean Air will sell five of its planes to U.S. aerospace firm Sierra Nevada Corporation, the airline said in an exchange filing on Wednesday.】

item.title: 拜登将在战场威斯康星州公布微软 33 亿美元的人工智能投资
item.description: 白宫表示，美国总统乔-拜登将于周三访问政治必争之地威斯康星州，宣布微软公司耗资33亿美元建造高科技数据中心的计划，这将创造数千个就业机会。【原文：President Joe Biden will visit the political battleground state of Wisconsin on Wednesday to announce plans by Microsoft Corp to build a $3.3 billion high-tech data center that will create thousands of jobs, the White House said.】

item.title: 全球经济信号不一，股票和债券摇摆不定
item.description: 投资者已经从为美国经济衰退做准备，转变为为世界最大经济体继续保持强劲势头做好准备。【原文：Investors have gone from bracing for a U.S. recession to positioning for the world's biggest economy to keep chugging along.】

item.title: 中国万科以亏损底价拍卖深圳地块
item.description: 资金短缺的中国万科正在通过拍卖以 22.4 亿元人民币（3.1 亿美元）的底价出售深圳一宗大型地块，这是该开发商为缓解流动性压力筹集资金的最新举措。【原文：Cash-strapped China Vanke is selling a large Shenzhen land plot at a reserve price of 2.24 billion yuan ($310 million) via auction, the developer's latest move to raise funds to ease its liquidity stress.】

item.title: 尽管市场 "动荡"，彪马在美洲的销售额仍恢复增长
item.description: 德国运动服饰品牌彪马周三表示，受复古鞋需求和美洲地区恢复增长的推动，该公司第一季度销售额达到预期，股价上涨超过 4%。【原文：German sportswear brand Puma's first-quarter sales met expectations on Wednesday, sending its shares rising more than 4%, helped by demand for its retro shoes and a return to growth in the Americas region, the company said.】

item.title: 成本居高不下，宝马第一季度汽车利润率下降
item.description: 宝马周三公布的第一季度财报显示，由于成本持续上升以及中国市场对豪华车的需求依然低迷，宝马汽车业务的利润率有所下降。【原文：BMW on Wednesday reported a lower first-quarter profit margin in its automotive segment as persistently higher costs continued to weigh and demand for luxury cars in China remained muted.】

item.title: 独家报道：亚马逊与西班牙电信达成云协议，进军欧洲 5G 网络
item.description: 德国电信公司高管告诉路透社，该公司将在本月晚些时候把 100 万 5G 客户转移到亚马逊网络服务（AWS）云上，这是美国在线零售商进军全球电信市场的一个大胆举措。【原文：Telefonica Germany will move one million 5G customers to Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud later this month, company executives told Reuters, in a bold move by the U.S. online retailer to break into the global telecoms market.】

item.title: 首席经济顾问：印度预计 25 财年经济增长将超过 7
item.description: 印度政府首席经济顾问阿南塔-纳格斯瓦兰（V. Anantha Nageswaran）周三表示，印度目前看不到通胀有任何严重的上升趋势，预计2025财年的经济增长率将超过7%。【原文：India does not see any nasty upside to inflation at the moment and expects the economy to expand by more than 7% in fiscal 2025, V. Anantha Nageswaran, the chief economic adviser to the government, said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 英国石油公司软化 2030 年石油减产基调以安抚投资者
item.description: 英国石油公司（BP）软化了其削减 2030 年石油和天然气产量承诺的措辞，以努力让投资者对其能源转型战略放心，并缩小与竞争对手之间巨大的价值差距。【原文：BP softened the language on its pledge to cut its 2030 oil and gas output in an effort to reassure investors over its energy transition strategy and narrow a gaping value gap with rivals.】

item.title: 西门子能源上调业绩展望，标榜陷入困境的风电部门更换首席执行官
item.description: 西门子能源公司（Siemens Energy）周三表示，将在不到三年后更换陷入困境的风力涡轮机部门的老板，并上调了本年度的业绩展望，这主要得益于其电网业务。【原文：Siemens Energy will replace the boss of its troubled wind turbine division after less than three years, the company said on Wednesday, also raising its outlook for the current year primarily on the back of its power grid business.】

item.title: 美国考虑将越南提升至 "市场经济 "地位
item.description: 本周三，美国商务部将就是否指定越南为 "市场经济国家 "听取证词，届时美国总统乔-拜登（Joe Biden）拉拢越南成为战略盟友的努力将与他争取工会工人选票的愿望发生正面冲突。【原文：U.S. President Joe Biden's bid to draw Vietnam closer as a strategic ally will clash head-on with his desire for union workers' votes on Wednesday as the Commerce Department hears testimony on whether to designate Vietnam as a "market economy".】

item.title: 丰田第四季度营业利润大增 78
item.description: 丰田汽车公司周三公布，受日元疲软和销售稳健的提振，第四季度营业利润增长约 78%，达到 1.11 万亿日元（72 亿美元）。【原文：Toyota Motor on Wednesday posted a roughly 78% rise in fourth-quarter operating profit at 1.11 trillion yen ($7.2 billion) boosted by a weak yen and solid sales.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利将美联储降息预期从 7 月推至 9 月
item.description: 摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）表示，目前预计美国联邦储备委员会将从 9 月份开始降息，而之前的预测是 7 月份，同时预计全年将继续降息三次，每次 25 个基点。【原文：Morgan Stanley said it now expects the U.S. Federal Reserve to start lowering interest rates from September, compared to its earlier forecast of July, while continuing to see three 25-basis-point rate cuts through the year.】

item.title: 早间竞标思考美联储的政策路径
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 人工智能热潮将推动今年亚洲的数据中心交易
item.description: 随着人工智能（AI）的蓬勃发展刺激了对数字基础设施的需求，全球私募股权投资者和资产管理公司正准备对亚太地区的数据中心进行价值数十亿美元的并购和投资。【原文：Global private equity investors and asset managers are readying for billions of dollars worth of M&A and investments linked to data centres in Asia Pacific, as the artificial intelligence (AI) boom fuels demand for digital infrastructure.】

item.title: KKR 将以 14 亿美元收购 Perpetual 的企业和财富管理部门；首席执行官 Adams 将退休
item.description: Perpetual 周三表示，收购巨头 KKR & Co 将以 21.8 亿澳元（14.3 亿美元）的价格收购其财富管理和企业信托业务，这使得这家澳大利亚金融服务公司的股价跌至五个月来的最低点。【原文：Perpetual said on Wednesday that buyout giant KKR & Co would acquire its wealth management and corporate trust businesses for A$2.18 billion ($1.43 billion), sending the Australian financial services firm's shares to a five-month low.】

item.title: 亚洲股市漂移，美元坚挺，美联储加息路径引人深思
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市缺乏方向，尽管美国国债收益率下降，但美元依然坚挺，因为市场评估了美国决策者和经济数据对美联储利率走向发出的好坏参半的信号。【原文：Asian stocks lacked direction on Wednesday, while the dollar remained firm despite lower U.S. Treasury yields as markets assessed mixed signals from U.S. policymakers and economic data on the path for Federal Reserve interest rates.】

item.title: 日元苦苦挣扎，美元重拾升势
item.description: 周三，美元重拾升势，在早些时候因美联储今年降息的押注重燃而遭受损失后小幅上扬，而日元则向 1 美元兑 155 日元的水平回落，并使来自东京的干预风险居高不下。【原文：The dollar was back on the front foot on Wednesday, making modest gains after earlier losses from renewed bets on Federal Reserve rate cuts this year, while the yen eased towards the 155 per dollar level and kept intervention risks from Tokyo high.】

item.title: 据中国国家媒体报道，特斯拉拟在中国推出机器人轴
item.description: 据《中国日报》周三援引未具名消息人士的话报道，特斯拉已提议在中国推出机器人轴。【原文：Tesla has proposed to launch robotaxis in China, newspaper China Daily reported on Wednesday, citing unnamed sources.】

item.title: 聚焦：通过现场检查，中国加强了对本地市场 IPO 候选者的审查
item.description: 据 10 位消息人士透露，中国监管机构正在审查旧的商业交易，甚至是高级管理人员的个人银行账户，同时加强对希望首次公开募股企业的检查，以减缓新的资本募集步伐，促进二级市场的发展。【原文：Chinese regulators are scrutinising old business deals and even the personal bank accounts of senior executives as they ramp up inspections of IPO hopefuls to slow the pace of fresh capital raisings and boost secondary markets, according to 10 sources.】

item.title: 油价因美国库存增加而走低
item.description: 市场消息人士称，美国石油学会的数据显示美国原油和燃料库存增加，表明需求疲软，油价在周三亚洲早盘交易时段下跌。【原文：Oil prices fell in early Asian trading hours on Wednesday after market sources said that data from the American Petroleum Institute showed an increase in U.S. crude and fuel stockpiles, an indicator of weak demand.】
